EmailTemplate.subject: Join us on 6/29 for our webinar — How to use Facebook for Sales
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Facebook enables merchants to showcase their business to over 1 billion global users. Webinar: How to use Facebook to Grow Online Sales June 29 from 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM ET Register Here <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/Facebook-0616Webinar-Registration-Page.html]]> Facebook enables merchants to showcase their business to over 1 billion global users. Whether you are just starting to build an online presence or looking to add a serious kick to your existing sales strategy, Facebook and BigCommerce have developed best practices to grow your business.
To help you develop and execute your online selling strategy, we've teamed up with Krupa Patel Bala, Advocacy Program Manager at Facebook, to present our latest webinar — How to use Facebook to Grow Online Sales <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/Facebook-0616Webinar-Registration-Page.html]]>. During this webinar, attendees will learn how to:
- Use Facebook Page to showcase your business - Promote your business with Facebook Ads - List your products with BigCommerce's Facebook Shop Space is limited, so sign up today! If you can’t make it, you can still reserve a spot <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/Facebook-0616Webinar-Registration-Page.html]]> to get an on-demand copy of the presentation. Reserve Your Seat <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/Facebook-0616Webinar-Registration-Page.html]]>
